name: oklahoman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Oklahoma: He has always identified himself as an Oklahoman. Type 2 diabetes affects more than 200,000 Oklahomans.
More examplesFewer examplesI'm proud to be an Oklahoman.An Oklahoman, she had never painted boats before coming to Catalina.Oklahomans are not alone in their concern with the deficit.

belonging or relating to the US state of Oklahoma or its people: She is of Oklahoman descent. The company is based in Tulsa and serves about 500,000 Oklahoman customers.
More examplesFewer examplesOklahoman police may have confiscated the tapes.The Oklahoman Publisher David Thompson said Moore was one of the most courageous men he has ever known.They fear that the Oklahoman ruling will encourage the powerful gun lobby all over America to try to roll back the reforms.
